descriptionHtml:
[color=#ebaf2d][size=4][u][b]Description[/b][/u][/size][/color]

For those who don\'t know Aery Soul, it was a 3D studio who created female fantasy and science fiction outfits (mostly erotic).
This mod aims to make a low poly version of Aery Soul\'s Black Lotus.

Currently, only the axe is available. It has the stats of an orcish war axe, and can be crafted in the orcish tree at the forge. I will soon try to do the armor.

[color=#ebaf2d][size=4][u][b]Installation[/b][/u][/size][/color]

Simply extract the Data folder in the Skyrim folder (typically C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim)
[b]This mod is compatible with the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/content/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url].[/b] Use it to (un)install and update easily.

[color=#ebaf2d][size=4][u][b]Notes[/b][/u][/size][/color]

This is the first time I did UV mapping and texturing and it\'s a pain in the ass (a lot more work than modelling, for me...) for a result that is far from perfect. I\'m open to advices.
I will start modelling the armor in the near future.
There are blood stains on the blade. I don\'t know why.

[color=#ebaf2d][size=4][u][b]Credits[/b][/u][/size][/color]

Design by Aery Soul.
author: Gilead Maerlyn
